


#include <stdio.h>
int main(void)
{
	int i,n;
	double  F;
	double Pi=1.1, K=0.88,s=0.036,N=2820;
	i=0;
	n=360;
//	printf("Enter n:");
//	scanf("%d,&n");
	for (i=0;i<=n; i=i+5)
	{
		if (i<=180)
			F=0.6*60000*Pi*((1/K)-1)/(2*s*N);
		else 
			F=-0.6*60000*Pi*((1/K)-1)/(2*s*N);
		printf("i=%d,F=%f\n",i,F);
	}
	return 0;
}
i=0,F=26.595745
i=5,F=26.595745
i=10,F=26.595745
i=15,F=26.595745
i=20,F=26.595745
